overview:
## Discussion

A value of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting] indicates that the observed object has received a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/setValue(_:forKey:)] message, or that the key-value-coding-compliant set method for the key has been invoked, or that one of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/willChangeValue(forKey:)] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/didChangeValue(forKey:)] methods has otherwise been invoked.

A value of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/insertion], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/removal], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/replacement] indicates that mutating messages have been sent a key-value observing compliant collection proxy, or that one of the key-value-coding-compliant collection mutation methods for the key has been invoked, or a collection will change or did change method has been otherwise been invoked.

You can use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber/uintValue] method on the `NSNumber` object to retrieve the value of the change kind.

# kindKey

**Type Property**

An `NSNumber` object that contains a value corresponding to one of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange] enums, indicating what sort of change has occurred.

## Declaration

```swift
static let kindKey: NSKeyValueChangeKey
```

## Discussion

A value of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting] indicates that the observed object has received a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/setValue(_:forKey:)] message, or that the key-value-coding-compliant set method for the key has been invoked, or that one of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/willChangeValue(forKey:)] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/didChangeValue(forKey:)] methods has otherwise been invoked.

A value of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/insertion], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/removal], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/replacement] indicates that mutating messages have been sent a key-value observing compliant collection proxy, or that one of the key-value-coding-compliant collection mutation methods for the key has been invoked, or a collection will change or did change method has been otherwise been invoked.

You can use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber/uintValue] method on the `NSNumber` object to retrieve the value of the change kind.

## Type Properties

- **indexesKey**: If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/insertion], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/removal], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/replacement], the value of this key is an `NSIndexSet` object that contains the indexes of the inserted, removed, or replaced objects.
- **newKey**: If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/new] was specified when the observer was registered, the value of this key is the new value for the attribute.
- **notificationIsPriorKey**: If the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/prior] option was specified when the observer was registered this notification is sent prior to a change.
- **oldKey**: If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/old] was specified when the observer was registered, the value of this key is the value before the attribute was changed.
